children.text: The rendered feature mouldings have been installed and fixed across the movement/control joints, which will likely result in cracking.
The Victorian Building Authority’s Guide to Standards and Tolerances clause 9.07 Covering movement control joints and damp-proof courses, states that
‘Mouldings and inflexible covering strips are defective if they are installed across movement control joints and are fixed or restrained on both sides’ .
This area will need to be rectified and re-rendered to ensure that the cracking does not appear in accordance with the above.
